title: Unetbootin question... How to use it to launch utilities?

forumNotes.author: wreckage
forumNotes.content:
Hello all. Can somebody please help me with this comment from the [Unetbootin page](http://unetbootin.sourceforge.net/ "External link"):  

"UNetbootin can also be used to load various system utilities". I would like to use it (from a thumbdrive) to access PartedMagic as well as NTPassword. Being a Linux novice, I was expecting some sort of instructions on how to do this, but can see none on the Sourceforge page.  

Can somebody please advise me on how I can do this suggested task?  

Thanks.
